languages.text: [Улыбнуться] "Какой захватывающий план. А вместо этого тебе всю ночь рапорт писать".
[Smile] "A most thrilling plan. But you have to spend all night writing up reports instead."
languages.original_text: [Улыбнуться] "Какой захватывающий план. А вместо этого тебе всю ночь рапорт писать".

traits.locale_text: [Smile] "A most thrilling plan. But you have to spend all night writing up reports instead."
[Smile] "A most thrilling plan. But you have to spend all night writing up reports instead."
[Smile] "A most thrilling plan. But you have to spend all night writing up reports instead."

[Smile] "A most thrilling plan. But you have to spend all night writing up reports instead."

languages.text: [Sourire] « Voilà un plan palpitant. Dommage que vous deviez passer toute la nuit à rédiger des rapports. »
languages.original_text: [Smile] "A most thrilling plan. But you have to spend all night writing up reports instead."

traits.locale_text: [Sourire] « Voilà un plan palpitant. Dommage que vous deviez passer toute la nuit à rédiger des rapports. »

languages.text: [微笑む]「なんてスリル満点な作戦なんだ。だが君は、その代わりに一晩中報告書を書かなくちゃいけないんだな」
languages.original_text: [Smile] "A most thrilling plan. But you have to spend all night writing up reports instead."

traits.locale_text: [微笑む]「なんてスリル満点な作戦なんだ。だが君は、その代わりに一晩中報告書を書かなくちゃいけないんだな」

languages.text: [Sonreír] «Es un plan muy emocionante. Pero en vez de eso tendrá que pasarse toda la noche escribiendo informes».
languages.original_text: [Smile] "A most thrilling plan. But you have to spend all night writing up reports instead."

traits.locale_text: [Sonreír] «Es un plan muy emocionante. Pero en vez de eso tendrá que pasarse toda la noche escribiendo informes».

languages.text: [微笑]“这可真是个激动人心的计划，但这样一来，你恐怕就得通宵写报告了。”
languages.original_text: [Smile] "A most thrilling plan. But you have to spend all night writing up reports instead."

traits.locale_text: [微笑]“这可真是个激动人心的计划，但这样一来，你恐怕就得通宵写报告了。”

languages.text: [Gülümse] "Çok hoş bir plan. Maalesef geceyi rapor yazarak geçirmen gerekecek."
languages.original_text: [Smile] "A most thrilling plan. But you have to spend all night writing up reports instead."

traits.locale_text: [Gülümse] "Çok hoş plan. Maalesef geceyi rapor yazarak geçirmen gerekecek."

languages.text: [Lächeln] "Ein ausgesprochen aufregender Plan. Aber Ihr müsst ja leider die ganze Nacht Berichte schreiben."
languages.original_text: [Smile] "A most thrilling plan. But you have to spend all night writing up reports instead."

traits.locale_text: [Lächeln] "Ein ausgesprochen aufregender Plan. Aber Ihr müsst ja leider die ganze Nacht Berichte schreiben."
